response.overview: Streetwise but down-on-his-luck, Clarence is struggling to find a better life for his family, while fighting to free himself of debt. Captivated by the power and glory of the rising Messiah and His apostles, he risks everything to carve his own path to a divine life, and ultimately discovers that the redemptive power of belief may be his only way out.
response.tagline: How far would you go to prove you're not a nobody?
response.title: The Book of Clarence

release_dates.note: Netflix (Baker Island, Johnston Atoll, Midway, Palmyra Atoll)
